Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows beneficiaries of certain deceased members to elect to receive death benefits in a lump sum
Summary: Allows a beneficiary of a member whose death occurs on or after July 1, 2025 and who would have been entitled to a service credit at the time of such member's death to elect to receive a lump sum payment equal to the pension reserve that would have been established had the member retired on the date of such member's death.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing beneficiaries of certain deceased members to elect to receive death benefits in a lump sum
